mean_cn: n.独身者，独身主义者；  adj.独身的，未婚的，禁欲的
mean_en: used to describe a person who is not married and does not have sex
sentence: This monk is celibate; he doesn\u0027t marry or have sex because of his religious beliefs.
sentence_trans: 这个和尚是独身者。因为宗教信仰，他禁欲且不婚。
word_etyma: celib单个 ＋ ate动词后缀 → celibate独身生活的人；独身的
